description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a0qq0","text":"This protocol details an optimized Endo H and PNGase F digestion assay that produces samples that can be run with the JESS Automated Western Blot System. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
